Game.Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Double Pack (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Yu-Gi-Oh! Double Pack is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in 2006.Cheat: Card PasswordsCard passwords for Grandpa's shop:Cheat: Card passwords for Grandpa's shop:Cheat: Card passwords for Grandpa's shop:Cheat: You must beat EVERY Millenium Guard to get back the Millenium Items. Where they all are is up to you to find out.Cheat: Enter the password "25410867" into the terminal in the card shop. When you face Reshef in the final battle, he will take on the appearance of Goemon Impact, a giant mecha robot from Konami's Legend of Mystical Ninja franchise.Cheat: Enter the following passwords to unlock the corresponding cards to the shop's inventory.Cheat: Enter these at the machine at the card shopCheat: After Everyone gets their 6th Locator cards, but before boarding the airship for the FInals there are two hidden duels you can participate in:
Game.Notes: This double pack is a compilation of two Yu-Gi-Oh! games, previously released individually for the GBA: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Sacred Cards Yu-Gi-Oh!: Reshef of Destruction
